name: Dalek
description: The Daleks were a warrior race made up of genetically engineered mutants belonging to fundamental DNA type 467-989. On many occasions, the Daleks openly acknowledged a single Time Lord, the Doctor, as their greatest enemy.

name: Human
description: Humans were a species of sentient primates. Though humans could trace their evolutionary past to Earth, many billions of humans were born on other worlds after humanity spread through the cosmos. Humans became so widespread that they eventually came to emphasise their relationship to worlds other than Earth, choosing to think of themselves not as Earthlings, but as Venusians and Martians.

name: Time Lord
description: The Time Lords (also knwon by many other names such as "the Sun Builders", "the Watchmakers", "the Superiors", and more) were the inhabitants of the planet Gallifrey, who were most famous for the creation and attempted monopolisation of time travel technology. They created and upheld the Laws of Time after establishing the Web of Time to keep the universe rational.

name: Alzarian
description: The Alzarians were one of three closely related species on Alzarius.

name: Crespallion
description: Crespallions were a blue-skinned race of humanoids native of Crespallion, which was not a planet but part of the Jaggit Brocade, affiliated to the Scarlet Junction, Convex 56.

name: Robot
description: A robot — also called an automaton by at least the Tenth Doctor — was a mechanical device with the ability to do work without the help of a living organism. Unlike Cybermen, robots were fully mechanical, with no organic components.

name: Trion
description: The Trions, originally known as the Clansfolk, were a race of humanoids from the planet Trion.

name: Trakenite
description: The Trakenites, also known as Trakens, were a race of peaceful humanoids native to the planet Traken. Through the Keeper of Traken, they maintained the Traken Union.

name: Silurian
description: The Silurians, also known as Earth Reptiles, Eocenes, reptile people, Psionosauropodomorpha, Homo Reptilicus, Homo reptilia and Reptilia sapiens, were a species native to Earth that pre-dated humanity.

name: Sontaran
description: The Sontarans were a humanoid race of belligerent and militaristic clones from the planet Sontar, created by the Kaveetch. They waged an eternal war throughout Mutter's Spiral against the Rutans. They made no effort to change this and did not want peace.

name: Zygon
description: The Zygons were a race of metamorphic humanoids. They originated from the planet Zygor, but often tried to migrate away from it.

name: Weeping Angel
description: The Weeping Angels were an extremely powerful species of quantum-locked humanoids, so called because their unique nature necessitated that they often covered their faces with their hands to prevent trapping each other in petrified form for eternity by looking at one another. This gave the Weeping Angels their distinct "weeping" appearance. They were known for being "kind" murderous psychopaths, eradicating their victims "mercifully" by dropping them into the past and letting them live out their full lives, just in a different time period. This, in turn, allowed them to live off the remaining time energy of the victim's life. However, when this potential energy paled in comparison to an alternative power source to feed on, the Angels were known to kill by other means, such as snapping their victims' necks.
